alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 1:46PM CDT until November 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL COMANCHE...NORTHWESTERN COTTON...SOUTHEASTERN TILLMAN AND NORTHWESTERN WICHITA COUNTIES... At 145 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Grandfield, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Geronimo, Grandfield, Chattanooga, Faxon and Loveland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
